application.doc: Retrieving a snippet of an instance-specific log file

param.name: file_id
param.doc: ID of the relevant log file.

param.name: options=line-numbers
param.doc: This parameter ensures that the returned log file snippet includes line numbers

param.name: size=snippet_size
param.doc: This parameter determines the number of lines to be returned if the default size of 100 lines is not required. Note that the maximum size that can be returned is 214800000 lines. If a size greater than that is specified, then the maximum (214800000 lines) is returned.

param.name: start=starting_line_number
param.doc: This parameter determines the line number in the log file where the snippet starts. If it is not set, then the snippet is retrieved from the end of the log file.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve a snippet of an instance-specific log file
method.doc: To retrieve a snippet of an instance-specific log file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the instance log file's resource URI.

request.doc:
To retrieve the full log: GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy_logging/instance/{instance_id}/{file_id}
To retrieve the log with line numbers: GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy_logging/instance/{instance_id}/{file_id}?options=line-numbers
To retrieve the last 100 lines of the log: GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy_logging/instance/{instance_id}/{file_id}?size=100
To retrieve the log starting at line 10: GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/reverseproxy_logging/instance/{instance_id}/{file_id}?start=10

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: contents
param.doc: The contents of the log file.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
